Container.Name: scprime
Container.Overview:
ScPrime is a cryptocurrency project targeting public cloud services with a blockchain based ecosystem to pay individuals to store data around the globe using smart contracts and cryptographic proofs to ensure accuracy, security and redundancy.
**Default Port Change v1.6.2:** ScPrime v1.6.2 now uses the default ports 4282 and 4283.
If you're upgrading from v1.6.0 and using the default ports, you can remove port 4285.
**Setup:** Command-line is required to configure your storage provider instance.
Open the Unraid terminal and enter: **docker exec -it scprime sh**
**Documentation:** https://docs.scpri.me/storageproviderindex
**Storage Network Status:** https://scpri.me/network
**Join the Discord for Help (Recommended):** https://discord.gg/scprime
Docker specific help can be found in the Discord: **#support-other**
